Conversion functions meaningful data frame also provided: can also directly plot resulting scalogram:  long sequences, required memory can exceed local memory. case can useful reduce time resolution result process data batches. can done fcwt_batch(). case batch size explicitly provided, heuristics used determine batch size automatically:
code: library(fcwtr)  # You are given some signal encoded in a numeric vector. # In this example we use some superimposed sin signals. signal <- ts_sin_superpos  output <-   fcwt(     signal,     sample_freq = 44100,     freq_begin = 16,     freq_end = 2100,     n_freqs = 200,     sigma = 5   )  # In this case the result is a matrix, # which can be used for further processing. dim(output) #> [1] 6000  200 head(as.data.frame(output), 10) #>    time_ind freq value         time #> 1         0 2100    NA 0.000000e+00 #> 2         1 2100    NA 2.267574e-05 #> 3         2 2100    NA 4.535147e-05 #> 4         3 2100    NA 6.802721e-05 #> 5         4 2100    NA 9.070295e-05 #> 6         5 2100    NA 1.133787e-04 #> 7         6 2100    NA 1.360544e-04 #> 8         7 2100    NA 1.587302e-04 #> 9         8 2100    NA 1.814059e-04 #> 10        9 2100    NA 2.040816e-04 plot(output) batch_result <-   fcwt_batch(     rep(ts_sin_sin, 10),     sample_freq = 44100,     freq_begin = 10,     freq_end = 12000,     n_freqs = 200,     sigma = 4,     time_resolution = 1 / 44100   )  plot(batch_result)

title: Fast continuous wavelet transform — fcwt
text: signal Real-valued time series. time steps assumed evenly spaced. sample_freq Sampling rate input time series. number primarily establishes connection physical units used frequency definitions well units output data. freq_begin Sets minimal frequency (> 0), units sample_freq, contained output. freq_end Sets maximal frequency (> freq_begin), units sample_freq, contained output. n_freqs Number frequency bins generated CWT. frequencies linearly distributed. Computation time increases raising number frequency bins. sigma Sets dimensionless parameter modifying wavelet spread time-domain roughly given \(\Sigma_t \sim \sqrt{2} \frac{\sigma}{f}\). Changing parameter adjusts time/frequency uncertainty balance. Defaults 1. Larger (lower) value sigma corresponds better (worse) frequency resolution worse (better) time resolution. remove_coi Boundary effects can result nonphysical artifacts. TRUE, function removes settings corresponding values NA. define essential support (Gaußian) wavelet four times standard deviation, \(4 \Sigma_t = 2 * \sqrt{2} \frac{\sigma}{f}\), wavelet touches boundary distance center wavelet boundary less \(4 \Sigma_t\). Values fall range removed remove_coi = TRUE. nthreads Number threads used computation, supported platform.

title: Fcwt batch processing — fcwt_batch
text: Performs fast continuous wavelet transform long sequences sequentially processing junks input signal keeping low-resolution output data preserve memory. useful long signals whose output fit memory whole. used short signals since boundary artefacts discarded (potentially dominate short sequences).

title: Fcwt batch processing — fcwt_batch
code: fcwt_batch(   signal,   sample_freq,   freq_begin,   freq_end,   n_freqs,   sigma,   max_batch_size = ceiling(4 * 10^9/(n_freqs * 4)),   time_resolution,   nthreads = 8L,   progress_bar = FALSE )

title: Fcwt batch processing — fcwt_batch
text: signal Real-valued time series. time steps assumed evenly spaced. sample_freq Sampling rate input time series. number primarily establishes connection physical units used frequency definitions well units output data. freq_begin Sets minimal frequency (> 0), units sample_freq, contained output. freq_end Sets maximal frequency (> freq_begin), units sample_freq, contained output. n_freqs Number frequency bins generated CWT. frequencies linearly distributed. Computation time increases raising number frequency bins. sigma Sets dimensionless parameter modifying wavelet spread time-domain roughly given \(\Sigma_t \sim \sqrt{2} \frac{\sigma}{f}\). Changing parameter adjusts time/frequency uncertainty balance. Defaults 1. Larger (lower) value sigma corresponds better (worse) frequency resolution worse (better) time resolution. max_batch_size maximal batch size used splitting input sequence. limits maximal memory used. Defaults roughly 4GB. actual batch size optimized use FFTW. time_resolution time resolution inverse units sample_freq result. Memory consumption directly related . Can higher time resolution input signal. nthreads Number threads used computation, supported platform. progress_bar Monitoring progress can sometimes useful performing time consuming operations. Setting progress_bar = TRUE enables printing progress bar console. Defaults FALSE.

title: Fcwt batch processing — fcwt_batch
text: case input sequences exceed certain size, output sequence fit local memory fcwt performed one run. instance, case processing song 10 minutes length (assuming sampling rate 44100 Hz), size output vector 10 * 60 seconds * 44100 Hz * nfreqs * 4 bytes, e.g. nfreqs = 200, equals ~ 21 GB, hence nowadays already limit hardware modern personal computer. cases required output time-resolution smaller time resolution input signal, one can perform fcwt() reduce output size averaging. (input signal time resolution can general reduced since high-frequency information get lost.) function splits input sequence batches, processes batch separately, reduces time resolution, adds outputs together. Attention: Boundary artefacts removed, high frequency information beginning end sequence lost. (amount depends minimal frequency captured min_freq.)
